actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Old Spanish Trail as a National Historic Trail.
short_title: Old Spanish Trail Recognition Act of 2002

summary.text: Old Spanish Trail Recognition Act of 2002 - Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the Old Spanish National Historic Trail (extending from Sante Fe New Mexico, to Los Angeles, California, that served as a major trade route between 1829 and 1848) as a National Historic Trail.

titles.title: Old Spanish Trail Recognition Act of 2002
To amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Old Spanish Trail as a National Historic Trail.
